attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app up this man was shown to me. I don’t even know what kinda human that was but it BUUUURNED my eyes. 🔥👄🔥 It was so scary I DO NOT by any means recommend this app to anyone ESPECIALLY CHILDREN. They don’t need to learn that monsters are real at a young age 😬😬. I hope my warning saved some poor souls 😔😔😔

attributes.review: 1. When I got on this app I was terrified about the picture with a black figure in a corner of a room. 2. Then I continued to use the app then a disturbing add came up. 3. This app needs to be deleted because another add told me to go on the dark web.
attributes.title: Delete this app

attributes.review: I got this app to keep updated with Trumps news, however it is constantly freezing and is very very slow. Sometimes it will even crash. Honestly it’s totally unusable.
attributes.title: Glitches and malfunctioning

attributes.review: This app is just so slow and I lost my vision staring at this big orange glob and I think it also managed to make me deaf. Now I cant hear or see. My dog also has been barking at lot at my phone since I’ve downloaded the app. I think the app gave my dog a virus
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: This app is the worst app that I have ever downloaded, and I have a conversion therapy app. It doesn’t work, it has bugs all over the place, and it is run by an awful human being with a shrimp peen 🍤 . Never download this app. EVER. I’m warning you ⚠️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and my phone immediately started glitching out. My apps were being moved, sometimes my camera would open up and start recording or taking pictures random! So scary!!!!
